lead_paragraph: Findings by Robert Owen, a retired High Court judge in Britain, present the most damning official link between the death of Alexander V. Litvinenko in 2006 and the highest levels of the Kremlin.
snippet: Findings by Robert Owen, a retired High Court judge in Britain, present the most damning official link between the death of Alexander V. Litvinenko in 2006 and the highest levels of the Kremlin.

headline.main: Full Report of the Litvinenko Inquiry
